text: A client submitted a review here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/partner-directory/details/112139>
Is there a way that this can be fixed/transfered?
I believe this table is only synced once a day right now (starting yesterday) due to an issue that should be resolved today.

Also FYI <@U25PYL3Q8> I read yesterday that reviews will not be part of v1 of the new directory. Any existing ones will transfer but that's it? People won't be able to leave new reviews apparently? There was a lot of people on FB complaining that it was left out of v1. Be interesting to see if your workaround works!
So how many votes does an idea need to get in the Ideas Community before HS answers to it?
I think they just look at the titles and go “oh that looks interesting”
and since votes push things to the top, those are just more likely to be read and responded to
